Reviews.Title: “Satisfied for price”
Reviews.Author: christopher h Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: clean tidy roomstaff helpful apart key cards breakfast consists toast ham cheese plus boiled egg dont expect hearty breakfast satisfying quiet ten mins walk dam square night sleep beware nightclub door loud overall satisfaction money paid days stay

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel in Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Brad N
Reviews.Content: spent nights agora visiting amsterdam reviews wife bed bugs thats plus positives location short trip train station approx 10 euro taxi fare beautiful flower market street easy beautiful walk canals anne frank house rijksmuseum van gogh museum dam red light district staff overnight time questions eat suggestion directions booked taxi station day ready waiting negatives actual hotel worn guide featured furniture 30s 40s true unfortunately doesnt look furniture received coat varnish noise review night club door loud shares wall club hear thumping beats people talking outside heard throwing neighbor overall feeling ownership attempting improve hotel bathrooms recently remodeled staff genuinely friendly helpful location cant centrally located staying isnt cheap didnt strike outrageously expensive european standards bad looking relatively cheap lodging location walking

Reviews.Content: wasnt booking hotel read bad reviews actually ok walking distance eg anne frank musem dam square ect staff helpfull pleasent gripe beds wernt comfortable party close music night job looking budget hotel spend alot time except changed lay head id definetly
